document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Diplomatic marathon kicks off to reinvent Europe after Brexit
document.topic_text: Diplomatic marathon kicks off to reinvent Europe after Brexit Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) French, German and Italian leaders are meeting today (22 August) on the island of Ventotene near Naples, opening a series of marathon diplomatic talks on the future of Europe. The Franco-German couple hopes to revive the EU project with a new political roadmap, EurActiv.com has learned.
